title: Looking for old slab serif "Egyptiennes Elargies" from French type book
content:
Does someone knows about "Egyptiennes Elargies"  
It is old slab serif, we found from old Frence type book.

Can I find any digital font close to this?  
Please advice.
author: martiniflats
